scripts.clean: npm run clean:js ; npm run clean:css
scripts.build:js: npm run clean:js ; npm run js:prebuild && npm run js:traceur && npm run js:bundle && npm run js:uglify && npm run js:afterbuild
scripts.build:js:dev: npm run clean:js ; traceur --out js/app.js --source-maps file --modules inline -- es6/main.js
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css ; npm run css:prebuild && npm run css:sass && npm run css:normalize && npm run css:autoprefixer && npm run css:uglify && npm run css:afterbuild
scripts.build: npm run build:js ; npm run build:css
